#include<stdio.h>
 
int main(){
	int n1,n2;
	int x1,x2;
	int carry,co;
	scanf("%d",&n1);
	scanf("%d",&n2);
	while((n1 !=0 ) || (n2 != 0)){
		carry = 0;
		co = 0;
		while((n1 != 0) && (n2 != 0)){
			x1 = n1 % 10;
			x2 = n2 % 10;
			carry = (x1 + x2 + carry)/10;
			if(carry)
				co++;
			n1 = n1 / 10;
			n2 = n2 / 10;
			}
		if(co == 0)
			printf("No carry operation.\n");
		else if(co == 1)
			printf("1 carry operation.\n");
		else if(co > 1)
			printf("%d carry operations.\n",co);
		scanf("%d",&n1);
		scanf("%d",&n2);
		}
	return 0;
}
